articles.title: 2021 MAMA Unveils Full Performer Lineup - soompi
articles.description: The 2021 Mnet Asian Music Awards (MAMA) has announced its lineup of performers! aespa, ATEEZ, Brave Girls, ENHYPEN, INI, ITZY, JO1, Kep1er, NCT 127, NCT DREAM, Stray Kids, and TXT, a total of 12 groups, will be lighting up the 2021 MAMA stage. CJ ENM revealed…
articles.content:

articles.author: Nathan Jolly
articles.title: TSMC To Make Custom iPhone 5G Modem – channelnews - ChannelNews
articles.description: Apple have made yet another move to reduce its reliance upon chipmaker Qualcomm, after buying Intel’s modem operations in 2019. Nikkei Asia reports that Apple has signed up TSMC to build the new custom iPhone 5G modem, which will feature 4-nanometer chip tech…
articles.content:
